title: EP 103 Hood Stars & Knockout Kings
itunes:title: EP 103 Hood Stars & Knockout Kings
description:
In this episode we have UFC fighter Max "Pain" Griffin and major Compton figure "BG Bop" on the concrete couch. We discuss some of BG Bop's untold "hood rescues", and his fathers life as a Black Panther. We then talk to Max Pain about his recent fight in which he knocked his opponents ear off (literally lol) and how he found his path from problem child to UFC rising star.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
